title: Easy Popping Instructions
output:
(1) Place unfolded {{1}} in the center of microwave {{2}} with this side up.
(2) Pop on High at {{3}} power until {{1}} {{5}} and popping slows to 1-{{6}} seconds between pops. Listen to popping rate and do not leave microwave {{7}}. Overcooking may cause {{8}}. Normal popping time is 2-5 {{9}}.
(3) Remove from microvave. {{10}} open {{1}} at top by pulling diagonally at {{12}}.
{{13}}!
Handle {{1}} by top {{12}} only. Open away from {{16}}. {{1}} and contents are very {{18}}! Children should not {{19}} without {{20}} supervision.

(4) {{21}}!
